name: Performance plan and evaluation of early career doctorates with supervisors, by position type, employment setting, and doctoral degree characteristics: 2017
description: Performance plan and evaluation of early career doctorates with supervisors, by position type, employment setting, and doctoral degree characteristics: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_number_of_early_career_doctorates_with_supervisors
variableMeasured.description: Number Of Early Career Doctorates With Supervisors

variableMeasured.name: field_of_those_with_written_performance_plan_percent_whose_plan_reflected_personal_career_development_goals_a_great_deal
variableMeasured.description: Of Those With Written Performance Plan Percent Whose Plan Reflected Personal Career Development Goals A Great Deal

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Counts are rounded to the nearest 100. Percentages are calculated from unrounded counts and rounded to the nearest 10th of a percent. Details may not add to totals because of rounding. Includes only early career doctorates with a supervisor.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Early Career Doctorates Survey, 2017.
